Texts.Chs: 助长计划进展顺利。这些耳廓狐是具有高度适应性的快速学习者，尽管他们显示出缺乏使用星际标准语言的能力。这无疑是由于他们的语言器官是的运作机理，而不是他们自己的问题。
Texts.Eng: Uplifting is going well. These Fenerox are highly adaptable and fast learners, though they do show a lack of capacity for using the galactic standard tongue. This is undoubtedly due to how their speech organs operate, and no fault of their own.

We've attempted to create a modified version that they can use to at least approximate the vowel and consonant sounds. Despite all of this, however, they appear to have very little capability for writing the language down. They prefer to use hand gestures to 'sign'

Texts.Chs: 有人甚至提到，等他学会写字的时候，他已经老了，头发也白了，因为太无聊了，他花了太长时间才弄明白。
Texts.Eng: it was too boring and took too long to figure out.

their words as they speak, and any amount of teaching them letters is met with doubt or annoyance. They move very swiftly, and writing (according to them) takes entirely too long. One even mentioned that he would be old and grey by the time he learned to write, because
